it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Game.Board

Class TowerLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Game.Board.TowerLayer

  • public class TowerLayer
extends java.lang.Object
    TowerLayer is a specific level of a TowerRegion in which can be placed a FamilyMember and performed a TowerAction. In the TowerLayer there are informations about:
    • card: card of this layer.
    • actionSpace: actionspace of this layer.

    A TowerLayer can be considered as a Set of a DevelopmentCard and a ActionSpace.

    Author:
    VaporUser.
    See Also:
    TowerRegion, DevelopmentCard, ActionSpace.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TowerLayer

        public TowerLayer(int regionID,
                  int actionSpaceID)
        TowerLayer constructor.

        The constructor needs the TowerRegion#RegionID and the id of the ActionSpace. It sets the ActionSpace.actionValue in function of the actionSpaceID.

        Parameters:
        regionID - is the TowerRegion#RegionID.
        actionSpaceID - is the ActionSpace.actionSpaceID.
        See Also:
        TowerLayer, TowerRegion, ActionSpace.

    • Method Detail

      • getCard

        public DevelopmentCard getCard()
        Get method for the card.

        It is helpful to get informations about the specified DevelopmentCard of this TowerLayer.

        Returns:
        this card.
        See Also:
        TowerLayer, DevelopmentCard.

      • getActionSpace

        public ActionSpace getActionSpace()
        Get method for the actionSpace.

        It is helpful to get informations about the specified ActionSpace of this TowerLayer.

        Returns:
        this actionSpace.
        See Also:
        TowerLayer, ActionSpace.

      • setCard

        public void setCard(DevelopmentCard card)
        Set method for this card.

        Change the specified DevelopmentCard of this TowerLayer with a new one. It is helpful when it starts a new turn and it is necessary to draw new cards from the Deck and set them on the TowerRegion.

        Parameters:
        card - a DevelopmentCard which substitutes the old card.
        See Also:
        TowerLayer, DevelopmentCard.

      • takeCard

        public DevelopmentCard takeCard()
        take the DevelopmentCard placed on this tower layer
        Returns:
        the DevelopmentCard on this towerLayer

      • flushTowerLayer

        public void flushTowerLayer()
        flush this tower layer, calling the flushActionSpace() method on the action space which compose this tower layer and setting as null the card field.
